column1: Smoque BBQ////Want to impress your out-of-town friends?  Bring them to Smoque. Everything on the menu is as good as you will find at any barbecue place
column2: and that's what makes Smoque so impressive. You can find some great  barbecue and side dishes at a lot of places in the Chicago area
column3: but Smoque is the only place that has them all together. A must experience for your out-of-town visitors! Also
column4: you will never find brisket better than this!
